column3: will come in a box of small-medium size and consists of:

column1: • Stone column with the blade attached Jade
• Two minifigs: Kapau and Lloyd uncapped and sleeveless shirt
It is aimed at an audience of at least seven years, but in this case I think we can safely say that even children with a year less and sufficient experience with
column3: bricks are able peacefully to assemble and play.

column1: Opening the package there are two envelopes containing bricks and some large pieces unwrapped, in this case, reading the instructions, it is recommended to open both envelopes and to unite all bricks before starting assembly the set.
It starts from the two minifigs Lloyd and Kapau, and continue assembling without any problem the stone column with Jade Blade, after that starts the construction of the Lloyd Gungle Raider.
In this case the assembly starts with the top of the raider, that is made with few pieces of
column3: and presents no difficulty making easy the assembly of the cookpit except for the rollbar of the driver and the eject mechanism of the two fronts lances who requires greater attention to be mounted properly.

column1: Over the top, you go to the bottom, that is composed with a lot of pieces from LEGO Technic that are used for the leaf spring suspension and wheel axles and requires some extra care, but nothing impossible.
After completing the assembly I consider it useful to point out:

column3: has no innovative solution in the Lego Ninjago world, but it is very attractive for raider design
column4: furthermore, the presence of Lloyd and the relatively low list price (&euro
column5: 19.99) make it a very interesting and recommended for a gift
